title: Crown Esports Looking for Diamond+ Support

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Crown Esports (@CrownEsportsAU). Oceanic Esports Organisation founded in 2018. League of Legends, PUBG. Business enquiries: crownesportsau@gmail.com. Australia

body:
Crown Esports is an amateur Oceanic Esports organisation specialising in League of Legends. We are currently looking for a Diamond + Support that is able to commit to a medium-long term position on the main roster, competing in the Cybergamer Ladder, Total Mayhem Gaming weekly tournaments and Summoner's Society tournaments. 

Requirements:
Age 16+
Diamond V+, Able to support with large champion pool
Dedicated, willing to improve, strong mental resolve
Working mic, previous experience playing competitively and strong macro/knowledge of play.

All interested applicants please add me through the League of Legends Client: Emil Lising

Have a good day everyone!
twitter.com/crownesportsau
